select rup.user_id,rup.user_pad_name,rp.pad_id,rp.pad_name,rp.pad_code from rf_user_pad rup left join rf_pad rp on rup.pad_id=rp.pad_id where rup.user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER} order by rup.bind_time desc

update rf_pad
batch_number = (case when batch_number is null then #{record.batchNumber,jdbcType=INTEGER} else batch_number + #{record.batchNumber,jdbcType=INTEGER} end ),
pad_control_port = (case when pad_control_port is null then #{record.padControlPort,jdbcType=INTEGER} else pad_control_port + #{record.padControlPort,jdbcType=INTEGER} end ),

user_control_id = (case when user_control_id is null then #{record.userControlId,jdbcType=INTEGER} else user_control_id + #{record.userControlId,jdbcType=INTEGER} end ),

control_protocol = (case when control_protocol is null then #{record.controlProtocol,jdbcType=INTEGER} else control_protocol + #{record.controlProtocol,jdbcType=INTEGER} end ),

batch_number = (case when batch_number is null then #{batchNumber,jdbcType=INTEGER} else batch_number + #{batchNumber,jdbcType=INTEGER} end ),

update rf_pad
modifier = #{modifier,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
modify_time = #{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
maint_status = #{maintStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where pad_code = #{padCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select distinct device_id from rf_pad where idc_id = #{idcId} and device_id is not null
select count(*) from rf_pad t where 1=1

sql.if:
AND exists (select device_id from rf_device D where 1=1 AND t.device_id = D.device_id
and ip2int(D.device_ip) >= ip2int(#{deviceIp})
and ip2int(D.device_ip) <= ip2int(#{deviceIp2})
)
